description:
Immerse yourself in the thrilling role of a detective with easy controls in this mystery game.
Discover concealed evidence within intricate illustrations and uncover the truth behind each case!
While the illustrations may appear straightforward at first glance, gathering the depicted evidence and solving the mysteries will genuinely challenge your wits.

・A woman was murdered in a room with an automatic lock. How did the culprit gain entry?
・The body of a woman discovered in the mountains. Which item serves as evidence of poisoning?
・A photo sent by the husband while on a business trip. Where can you find evidence of infidelity?

Each story stands alone as an episode, allowing you to play at your leisure during free time.
For those new to puzzle solving and deduction, helpful hints are available!
Players of all skill levels can enjoy the game with peace of mind.

The game supports both button controls and touch controls, so you can play in TV Mode, Handheld Mode, or Tabletop Mode.
name: 3 minutes Mystery
